data.text: @patybyrne @KevinSMcArthur They have wifi underneath the rock you live?
@KevinSMcArthur Even vacc’d you can become infected you just reduce the severity. Vaccines don’t stop us from getting sick only can prevent us from becoming severely ill. That’s science not opinion
@patybyrne @KevinSMcArthur All while you're weakening your immune system but eh stay scared stay jabbed 🤣🤣

@KevinSMcArthur Why why why why why do people KEEP thinking vaccines make you immune… it has been repeatedly stated that being vaccinated reduces your chances of severe consequences and hospitalization…what we need is a vaccine for STUPID… but alas you can’t fix STUPID!!!

@patybyrne @KevinSMcArthur I am 0x vaccinated, chew my fingernails, Never sanitize, don't wear a mask. And as far as I know haven't been  infected... even after Delta came  Into my house,  got my 2x vaccinated wife sick and my kids sick for a day. The vaccine push is illogical. Get it if you're vulnerable.
@patybyrne @KevinSMcArthur Thank you for doing your part and staying away from people.  Please continue to do so…forever.

@patybyrne @KevinSMcArthur I was at a dinner with 4 other people, I was the only one not vaccinated, 2 of them got sick within 2 days, I was not one of them. I also get plenty of fresh air and exercise so well as taking C, D, and zinc. We are all responsible for our own healthy choices.

@KevinSMcArthur It’s a virus. You can try and ‘protect toureelf’ however you will get it. Big deal. Now I’m sure you must recognize that you aren’t vaccinated. Vaccinated means you don’t get the disease. Like chickenpox. Or measles. Etc. Csrry on with life
